title: (28210) Valdemorillo - Avenida Roncesvalles

title: (28270) Madrid -

title: (28212) Navalagamella - 39 Calle de las Eras
description: Mirador del Hondillo, parking very quiet land and with spectacular views. Picnic tables and a 6 km hiking trail from there.

title: (28210) La Pizarrera -
description: We spent 2 nights there without being disturbed. Quiet place some hikers and fishermen during the day. Fairly flat place to park a van or motorhome, a small pitch remains in the shade for most of the day (2 vehicles). Access is via a path with a few holes, but it is not inconvenient to access it. A restaurant bar is located around the lake, you can go there by canoe or paddle. We bathed every day, the water is quite clean. Around you can see the mountains, it's very pretty! We went to eat at a restaurant (7min by car) “restaurante casavieja” we eat very well there!

title: (28212) Navalagamella - 44 Calle de Amargura
description: Large parkin, ideal for a short stop or staying one night on the road. There is light. At night it is very quiet. On Sunday you have to leave it before 7am, they put on the market.

title: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada -
description:
Parking in beaten earth, the path to access the place is slightly bumpy.
Great sunset over the mountains

title: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada - 25 Calle Pintor Zuloaga
title_short: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada - 25 Calle Pintor Zuloaga

title: (28693) Quijorna - 2 Calle Nabera

Cerca de la ciudad de San Lorenzo del escorial.Zona asfaltada sin urbanizar.
Pase una noche en auténtico silencio y con pajaros cantando al amanecer.
Buenas vistas.
Gente paseando por la mañana Muy respetuosa.
Recomiendo.

Area of large meadows with plenty of space to park.
go to the end of the road where you will find a barrier that cuts it off.
Just behind the Escorial monastery.
during the day there are cars but at night it is empty and very quiet.

title: (28690) Brunete - 1A Calle Norte

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga

description: Quiet street near local police, several parks next door with benches and shade. Supermarket Day next door too. Online parking

title: () San Lorenzo de El Escorial -

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial

In general sunny, although it has some shadows. It has no height limitation. To sleep it is super quiet since the asphalted forest track has hardly any traffic and less at night. Fountain and garbage containers one kilometer below.

name: Camping Capfun El Escorial
title: (28200) Camping Capfun El Escorial

title: (28213) Colmenar del Arroyo - 5A Calle del Calvario
title_short: (28213) Colmenar del Arroyo - 5A Calle del Calvario

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
description:
A nice and a quiet parking place in front of the kids school. Apple of parking spices nearby as well. absolutely quite at night, amazing to sleep.. woke up with birds chiringuito around 6 and 8 by school kids noise. No sign of any type of prohibition.
Pharmacy and other shops at 5 mins walk. Carrefour, and Fuel station at 5 mins drive. Next to it mall of all big brands like Puma, addidas, Leroy Merlín.

title: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Vereda de la Resancha
title_short: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Vereda de la Resancha

title: (28222) Majadahonda - Camino de la Dehesa
description: Parking in the middle of nature very quiet and without problems of staying overnight! During the day it has a little traffic of vehicles, but the night very quiet.

title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 29 Travesía de Navalcarbón
description: Ample parking in front of the Las Rozas natural park, very quiet and safe, we have spent 3 great nights, easy transportation to the center of Madrid.

title: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
title_short: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
description: Public parking, level dirt floor, ample for ACs. Next to the train station to go to Ávila, Madrid, El Escorial, ... Very friendly town. Formerly there was a water source nearby. In summer there are some small shops.

title: (28232) Las Rozas - Unnamed Road
description: Huge local parking area free of charge. If not busy you can park little behind to disconnect from road noice. Near by: supermarket,restaurants and bars, athletic stadium and swimming pool, indoor skydiving simulator and very nice park for walks or bycicle rides. Water pumps with drinkable water placed on the side of the park. Also 300 m far is Repsol gas station. If you need WIFI there is street full of little restaurants with accesible connection.

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 14 Calle Copenhague
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 14 Calle Copenhague
description: Repsol gas station with water service, I don't know if it is drinkable, and air. The water pressure is low, you have to come early. As for the air pressure, it reaches up to 6bars.

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 33 Calle Cañada Real
description: Place to park in Villalba, near the old town and near shopping centers

title: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
title_short: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
description: Dehesa in Seville the new, quiet place, you have to take a path to get to the picnic, there is a water source that works in verano.Sitio with much charm in the town.

title: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile
title_short: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Parking in the Service area of the Cepsa gas station, if you come on the A6 towards Madrid, to rest before entering Madrid, we spend the night and sleep is fine, at 23.00 the gas station and the bar close until 7 , 00 so there is little movement, except for a few trucker who stop to rest.

description: Ecolaundry Self-Service Laundry with payment by mobile application or by coins

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 2 Calle Granja del Conde
description: Giant parking parallel to the road. Right now it's Sunday at 22:53 and there are cars passing by. The good part is that it is next to the headquarters of the local police and in front of a grocery store that is still open.

title: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - Camino de la Ermita
title_short: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - Camino de la Ermita
description: Quiet area next to the hermitage of Navahonda. In a very pleasant holm oak forest to spend a night or a field day. Without services The access trail is dirt, but without bumps.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
description: It is a 24h Carrefour express gas station, it will be the first night here I suppose it will be good for us, since we have many truckers also resting here, the good thing that we also have is that you can buy at the same gas station for an emergency I hope it helps

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 2 Camino del Pocito

First one hundred meters asphalted, between two schools, school days and and at school hours, a lot of parked cars, outside these zero hours Supermarkets at 800 m, Madrid M40 and M50 ring roads at ten and five minutes Perfect rest, nearby houses

title: (28439) Alpedrete - 22 Calle de la Parra
description: Very quiet residential area, with a playground.

title: (28294) -
description: Madrid NASA Space Station Parking.

title_short: (28231) Las Rozas de Madrid - 2 Calle Comunidad de Baleares
description: Parking where to spend the night, about 3 ac and camper about 5 depending on the site. The gas station is close enough. peaceful place.

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 4D Camino Mina
description: Quiet vacant lot in a residential neighborhood on the outskirts of Madrid. The population here is high income so there is a lot of tranquility. We have spent one night. Good views of Madrid and a lot of silence.

title: (28248) La Berzosa - 8 Avenida la Berzosa
description: Parking in Berzosa Park. Quiet place to park and spend the night. The car park is not for motorhomes, but then there is space for some motorhomes and if you go a little further (towards the city), on the right, there is a esplanade of land where it is even easier for motorhomes. The site is perfect for trekking and mountain biking, it is very beautiful. The city has a lot of life

title: (28609) Villanueva de Perales - 126 Poligono 12
description:
This is a very quiet town, it has three fountains in the center of the town, bakery, supermarket, butcher, pharmacy...
I recommend it, I have spent a few nights and you can sleep peacefully, it is 35 minutes from Madrid and 20 minutes from the Picadas dam, which is a spectacular natural site.

title: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535
title_short: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535
description: Very quiet night on a large empty car park with views of the stars.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32 Calle del Licenciado Vidriera
description: Quiet parking with the possibility of routes

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
description: Parking once past the entrance to the Valle de Los Caídos by the bus door, take the direction of the monastery and you will find a very large parking. Only open at the time of the visits.

title: (28660) - 211A Terreno Sector Sur 11
description: Wide free open parking place attached to the ML-3 tram station terminal. It has 3 levels. I recommend the last/upper one. Almost nobody uses it. The police use to patrol the area so it’s safe. There are a couple of grocery shops at the other side of the street. The tram takes you to Madrid in 30min. No services in the parking lot. Lots of restaurants and shops in the same avenue downwards. Walking trails at a block distance. Nice sunsets from the upper part of the parking lot.

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
description: Parking to visit the basilica, available during opening hours. you have to pay at the entrance of the site, except Sunday which is free for EU nationals ...

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 9 Calle la Traviata
description: Quiet and well located location. There is a Mc Donalds nearby and also a supermarket. We spent the night and during the day we went by bus to the center of Madrid

title: (28222) Majadahonda - 14 Calle Fresa
description: Free parking next to the ice rink, spacious and fairly level, it is in a commercial area with hypermarkets, restaurants, workshops, etc..., it does not have any services, only garbage containers

title: (28694) Chapinería - 4 Travesía Bellomonte
description: Parking at the foot of a large lot. Very quiet area. Without fountain and without toilets. There are several bars in the town. at night you can see the sky because there is hardly any light pollution. Only for small campers. AC more complicated.

title: (28694) Chapinería - 11 Calle Poligono 8
description: Interpretation Center Parking

name: Dehesa Park
title: (28400) Dehesa Park

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32B Calle de Santa Quiteria
description: Parking place where many cars enter and there is a lot of space. Right in front there is a huge park with skate park soccer fields and a fountain

title: (28221) Majadahonda - 1T Poligono Este
description: Parking in a nice area with a lot of well-kept green. ideal for a quiet night out.

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 82 Calle Mallorca
description: Quite flat quiet parking located between urbanizations.

title: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón - Paseo Monte de la Villa
title_short: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón - Paseo Monte de la Villa
description: Quiet parking in the ground. Perfect for one night. A few cars late afternoon ... Seems to be a meeting point in the region.

description: Quiet, flat location next to a nice park

name: Camping El Canto la Gallina
title: (28295) Camping El Canto la Gallina

title: (28694) Chapinería - 25 Calle del Pozo Airón
description: Very quiet, next to a small pond with a source of drinking water, 5 minutes from the town center.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 21 Calle Fuente del Espino
description: Quiet street for parking with chalets on both sides. We have spent the night very very well. Recommended for a rest stop.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 24 Calle de la Pasada
description: Nice place in the mountains of Madrid, surrounded by nature, there are quarries but bathing is prohibited, a fishing spot, ample flat parking and with the possibility of many hiking and MTB routes

title: (28295) Valdemaqueda - 1X Calle Umbría
description: Small esplanade of grass and earth, with beautiful views near the town and the beginning of the route to the Roman bridge and river cofio, I discovered it when I returned from the route because I parked the AC in a square in the town

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Río Guadiana
description: Large esplanade with part in shadow next to several gas stations with shop and a Supercor. Very quiet, even at the Guadarrama parties.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5 Calle de los Escoriales
description: Parking behind the supermarket with many places for any size. Did not slept here, but used to visit the city

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5B Calle de los Escoriales
description: For troubleshooting, NON-DRINKING water at the service station.

title: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
description: Se entra por una calle al parecer privada, pero no lo es. te deja justo en el campo. Es llano, pero no hay servicios. pasea mucha gente al perro por las mañanas, pero muy calmado. a dos minutos del centro del pueblo.

title: (05239) Peguerinos -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature, right in front of the swamp to take a morning dip. The access road is not paved and is two-way, there are several entrances to park. It is important to mention that the road does not surround the entire reservoir and that it is not recommended for very low vehicles.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Calle Villa
description: Parking in front of the lake in the middle of nature, an inhabitant of the closest town, Peguerinos, told me. Very quiet place. There are 2 "parkings" when you follow the path, both the same.

name: Camping Madrid Rainbow
title: (28670) Camping Madrid Rainbow
description: Camping at the edge of the motorway with pretty close places. Good welcome. Clean toilets, free Wifi at the reception. Motorhome area at the top of the campsite. For Madrid, bus nearby.

title: (28295) Valdemaqueda - 31 Travesía dos de Mayo
description: Square in the center of town, next to the road, apparently you can park, I spent a night in between, beautiful area to do routes

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful place to spend the night in nature listening to the cows and with the possibility of having breakfast looking at the reservoir. recommendable

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la jarosa
description: Good parking to spend the night without any more noise.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la Jarosa
description: One of the 3 car parks that the reservoir has. It is the furthest (one kilometer from the first) but it is worth it for its tranquility to sleep. The reservoir is next door, you can have dinner next to the reservoir (with your chairs, table and food) and enjoy a night under the stars. Natural environment and very quiet. There is no service. It depends on whether you are in the car park. In the previous car park, about 500 meters away, there is a restaurant.

title: (28440) Guadarrama -
description: Very large parking lot under the pine trees located near a bar, early morning hiker, 20 minutes from Valle los Caidos and 1:00 from Madrid. Access with nasturtium cc and 7 meters long. There is very clean service.

title: (28295) Valdemaqueda - Puente Mocha
description: Puente de La Mocha, a very nice place next to the river. Wide sandy road, small and not very level parking, on weekends and holidays it fills up quickly. Large motorhomes fit just right. It seems that you can stay overnight.

title: (28660) Boadilla del Monte - 13B Paseo de Madrid
title_short: (28660) Boadilla del Monte - 13B Paseo de Madrid
description: Fairground parking, light underground station

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - 34 Carretera de Robledo
title_short: (28695) Navas del Rey - 34 Carretera de Robledo
description: Quiet area with playground for children to play.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 12 Calle de la Sierra
description: Parking for cars and RVs. You can spend the night here during the week and outside of events. Then many cars park here and it will be difficult to get out again. We visited the medieval market. Very quiet during the week. Without services.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - 49 Peñas Blancas
description: Small parking on the side of the road that gives access to the Peguerinos campsite and the Abantos high. It is next to the road but it is quiet. Helpful and welcoming people. Nice mountain routes in the area.

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - Plaza Príncipe
description: Very quiet and level ground. Stayed here for one night in early October as visited the local wildlife centre (highly recommended).

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful spots among the pine trees, Reservoir close by for walking around with dogs. Lots of walking tracks in the hill also! There is a little church and cafe but they weren’t open while we were there. We stayed for 3 nights with out a problem. Lots of rubbish bins around the site. There are a few little spots of the road running around the lake with ample amount of space for several motorhome . Only 45 mins from Madrid

title: (28296) Santa María de la Alameda - Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road
title_short: (28296) Santa María de la Alameda - Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road
description: Access by a dirt road, no problem for a van, we spent a very quiet night, very beautiful views, a restaurant nearby in the village, without services.

address.street: Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - 49 Avenida del Generalísimo Franco
title_short: (28695) Navas del Rey - 49 Avenida del Generalísimo Franco
description:
A stop on the road for the night.
in front of  emergency and Health Center

title: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 11 Camino del Cementerio
title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 11 Camino del Cementerio
description: Parking for vans in a quiet place a bit out of town. Access open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Access gate to the park "la cabilda". Drinking water source ten minutes walk inside the park. There are several sources inside; They are not signposted, but the path is wide enough to find them easily. Quiet and discreet place, little frequented except for summer weekends during the day.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Camino de los Rajuelos
description: La Nava Recreational Area, next to the Campings. Little mobile coverage. Spacious, level, without services, only with fountain and barbecues to use except the summer months. Quiet at night but very popular during the day on weekends. Nice place and with hiking trails.

name: Camping Valle Enmedio
title: (05239) Camping Valle Enmedio
description: Valle de enmedio campsite, an excellent place to hike through the Sierra de Guadarrama natural park. spacious pitches, some with some unevenness.

name: Camping La Nava
title: (05239) Camping La Nava
description:
Very large campsite with free pitches. Very quiet even on weekends. A few permanent caravans. Friendly welcome. Internet only by wifi at the bar. No network in the campsite.
Much quieter than the Enmedio campsite next door. No swimming pool.

address.street: Carretera de Peguerinos- Alto del León KM 3600

title: (28296) Las Herreras -
description:
Old exit from the road. slightly on slope. very calm. cars are not heard. only birds.
there is a bit of garbage [rubble bags, televisions]

title: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
title_short: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
description: A fairly flat parking lot. There is a bar nearby, very quiet at night.

title: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón -
description: Service area to wash the motorhome, since the washes are high. And free water to recharge.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 3 Calle de la Tejera
description: Public parking of the Tejera. Fairly quiet. Next to a park with tables and trees. There are services, but they are closed. In the park there is a fountain. Next to the town, with all the services; Supermarket, bar, restaurant, hardware store. Ideal for walking or cycling routes

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 36 Calle España
description: Laundry at the Meroil petrol station 5 min walk from the Moralzarzal district.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 51 Calle de las Suertes
description: Two areas with picnic tables around a children's play area. It has a drinking water source and you can park well.

title: (28412) Moralzarzal - 11B Urbanización la Herradura
description: Public parking next to Mercadona in a relatively quiet place. Short level spaces within the parking lot. Possibility of parking in line in front with any size.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
description: A simple parking lot in the middle of the houses. You hear street noise. There are no services, but the place seems safe even if it is absolutely charmless. It's certainly not a place to spend the day, but for an overnight stop if you arrive late, it's fine.

title: (28620) Aldea del Fresno - 21 Calle Perales
description: Area for draining gray water and water. Ample parking and containers

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 21 Calle de los Cástines
description: Great place to park and rest. It is just a short walk to the historic center. Quiet, spacious, and well-kept parking area. It has a 24 hour gas station right next door. And also a supermarket. Not many cars usually pass by and it allows you to rest well.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 1 Diseminado Camino Agua Riaza
description: Prairie of San Isidro, meadow with small trees and small shadows, is usually quiet but can coincide with some celebration, since there are swings, barbecue area and fountains. Discard coming in the week of San Isidro (May 15) there is a fair all week and it is impossible to park

title: (05230) Las Navas del Marqués - CL-505
description: Great place to stop and eat, lots of shade.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - Unnamed road
description: Quiet place next to institute

title: (05230) Las Navas del Marqués -
description: Recreational area of Valladal. Around the area, many nice places more or less flat. Easy access.

title: (28460) Los Molinos - 7 Calle las Dalias
description: Central, quiet and flat esplanade of land used as a town parking lot. Good place to park comfortably and spend the night to visit the mountains on the shuttle bus. Note: In summer there may be more noise from young people who make a bottle and in September it is occupied by the portable bullring for the festivities

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Unnamed Road
description: Parking, quiet, with good shade, access by road that something complicated for motorhome but it van well. To access the marshes is that lower by a road and in 5 minutes we are there!

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 10X Paseo del Alparrache
description: Parking of the bullring, quite flat, very central, 5 min to the town square. It has a park next door, 4 restaurants, the medical center opposite, a laundry and a motorhome workshop.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 11 Calle de los Charcones
description: Laundry next to a Mercadona, quite well located

title: (28480) Guadarrama - 13 Arrabal Extrarradio
description: Car park of El Alto de los Leones. I think we can decide and stay overnight, to be confirmed. Excellent view.

title: (05239) La Estación - Unnamed Road
description: We spent a night in the middle of nature surrounded by a pine forest. There is an accessible dirt road and the road is relatively close although the cars are not heard. Early in the morning someone can pass by for a walk. Very cool place at night.

title: (28048) Madrid - 2A Carretera Colmenar Viejo
description: A large, flat, sandy parking area not far from the palace, dam and reservoir, with shade for cars but little for taller vehicles. The more than 40 picnic tables suggest that it gets crowded in the summer. Good for walking, including steps to the river. It can be windy, with little shelter. Clean and quiet. There is no lighting.

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Old railway at the foot of the reservoir of Picadas, very quiet for the night, difficult access by road very sloping and riddled with rain, we came down with a vehicle of 7 p.

title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos

title: (28048) Madrid - 1D Calle Almenas

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 25 Autovía del Suroeste
description: Service area in Navalcarnero with ample parking, its own exit from the A-5 motorway, there is also a hotel called Las Vegas.

description: Quiet and secure parking next to a school and residential neighborhood bus and metro nearby

title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 3 Diseminado Camino Ferrocarril
description: Parking area to spend a great day in an environment of nature, with the beach to swim and tables to eat, a lot of shade, forbidden to camp, but quiet bivouac tolerated. if you can not find any place you can go to the opposite bank because the area is even flatter.

title: (40410) El Espinar - 31 Carretera Coruña

title: (28935) Móstoles -
description: Unpaved parking, next to a school, is a quiet neighborhood, I used to live in that area, there are usually no problems. I have spent 4 nights, nearby you have a gym (body factory) with a pool all year round, there you can pay for a day and use showers. There is a Dia supermarket, a 5-minute walk away, later a mercadona, and a carrefour, in the carrefour gasoline, where the wheels are built there is a little water hose. Except at parties, there is always room. You can see the sunset.

title_short: (28620) Aldea del Fresno - 65 Diseminado Carreta Quebrada

I had a very quiet night. The activities that I say are carried out in the reservoir that is 10 'away, here we just stop and pass the time. No service or anything to highlight.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 5 Calle Europa
description: Open parking lot from a Commercial center. Concrete almost flat surface.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Calle del Beneficio
description: Creepy and lonely parking at night, near a militarized zone, and plenty of space for your "dog" poo. Great if you want to stay somewhere more private outside of Madrid. Hiking opportunities with a great view atop a mountainous region.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 2 Avenida del Rosal
description: Quiet place where you can park with 3 stone tables and litter bins. quiet area to sleep

title: (40400) El Espinar - Unnamed Road
description: A very quiet place with beautiful views. There is a source of drinking water nearby.Night prohibited

title_short: (28223) Pozuelo de Alarcón - 7 Calle del Doctor Raso

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - 7 Calle Puerto de Navacerrada

title: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: Picnic area at the entrance to the town of Cerceda coming from Madrid. There is a small flat area to leave the van and picnic tables and rubbish bins. It is attached to the road but does not have much traffic at night.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 0 Calle Bruselas
description: LIDL outdoor parking. Perfect to reach the center of Alcorcón (and possibly metro / bus) during the day, quiet and peaceful during the night. It is a commercial area with lots of parking lots nearby.

title: (28224) Madrid - Unnamed Road
description:
Public parking.
3 portable toilets and bins.
Quiet site and frequented peak, very quiet.

title: (40410) El Espinar - 2 Calle San Juan
description: Entrance of the high parking the Lions

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 7-9 Avenida de América
description:
Long straight line with parking in both directions next to the side entrance of the Tres Aguas Shopping Center (the center parking has a gauge).

Ideal for visiting the shopping center (Mercadona plus all kinds of shops, restaurants, cinemas, etc., ...)

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Carretera del Pantano
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Carretera del Pantano
description: Parking at the edge of the San Juan water reservoir, good access, several locations along the way, probably crowded in summer and less quiet; bars and restaurants nearby, surrounded by nature and water where it is possible to swim.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 11 Calle Estambul
description: Quiet, safe and free parking area at the door of Hopistal Quiron. It has a cafeteria for breakfast and the toilets are impeccable. Madrid X is a few meters away with a wide range of restaurants.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Magdalena 15-17
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. It lacks services but it is very close to the urban center and one step away from the Navacerrada reservoir.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - C. Viena
description: There is plenty of parking after 5pm. Between the building and the playground there is a drinking water fountain. Lots of green area to walk. In summer it is not recommended, the trees are still small. Vehicle traffic zone.

name: Camping La Ardilla Roja
title: (28696) Camping La Ardilla Roja
description: CAMPING LA ARDILLA ROJA It also offers bungalows and mobile -homes. It has a cafeteria, bathrooms with showers, laundry, swimming pool, activities, ... Very quiet place next to the San Juan reservoir. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (28922) Alcorcón -
description: Laundry, in the Parking XMadrid

title: (28048) Madrid - M-612
description: Small parking site with picknick table and a beautiful view. to have a relaxed day and enjoy nature or the tasteful restaurant at the other side of the road.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 12 Calle Berlín
description: Free parking at the train station. Without services, but next to Madrid

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 6 Avenida Móstoles
description: service station with LPG

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 9A Calle Presbítero Blanco
description:
Free public parking just behind the local police office. To enter this place you must have access between the police building and El Porrón Restaurant.
At the corner of the entrance you can see a yellow sign indicating the direction to this public parking.
It is a place protected from the wind and very quiet since it is located between urbanized areas and although it is very close to the center, no noise or traffic is heard.
It has a large park but the nearest fountain is in Plaza del Gargantón a few meters away and from which you can catch water but not load tanks with hose.
At the moment it is of beaten earth and it is a very calm place.
Prohibited to remove tables, chairs or any other camping element. Please respect the environment and use the bins.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3 Pasaje de las Eras
description: Small parking on the other side of the park. a little more flat and quiet for my taste, there is less passage of people and on Sundays there are fewer people, because in the parking lot below many people leave the car to take the vermouth from the El Porron bar and sometimes they block the access road , do not miss visiting it, playground next door. It is a parkimg not a campsite. prohibited to take out goods abroad. Vehicles over 7m50 pass carefully

name: Camping Monasterio de Pelayos
title: (28696) Camping Monasterio de Pelayos
description: Camping enfermeria, there are pitches for tents. Location of the mobile home, bungalows, caravan, land, house bar-restaurant and shop.

title: (28048) Madrid - 48 Carretera Madrid-El Pardo
description: Parking on the banks of the Manzanares River. Area with covered and outdoor parking. You can go fishing and go hiking. There is a drinking fountain, tables and a children's play area past the fountain. There are also river beach areas to get your feet wet.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
title_short: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
description: A beautiful place by the river without noise and perfect as a starting point for many routes. It is a bit difficult to find the level but it is easy and as it is right at the entrance of the natural park it is allowed to stay overnight.

title: (28921) Alcorcón - 7 Calle Soria
description: Self-service laundry

title: (28023) Madrid - 11C Carretera Madrid-El Pardo
description: Parking next to the Pardo road. It has trees that provide shade during the day. Ideal for mountain biking through Monte del Pardo.

title: (28921) Alcorcón - 1 Calle Ávila
description: Laundromat 8 am-10.30pm 4 Eurosport 15 kg

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 22 Calle de Navalcaballo
description: Parking behind the sports center in a dead end street. surrounded by chalets

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 28 Avenida de la Sierra del Guadarrama
title_short: (28470) Cercedilla - 28 Avenida de la Sierra del Guadarrama
description: Town hall parking, not to be confused with the Day one. The entrance is somewhat narrow but any AC will fit in (ours is 2.25m wide). Further down there is more parking, more sheltered, but on weekends it is used for large bottles.

address.street: 28 Avenida de la Sierra del Guadarrama

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 53 Calle Manuel González Amezúa
description: Great quiet and quiet place, attached to a small river, (You can only hear the relaxing noise of the water). To park and spend the night, ideal if you travel with young children like me. There is a small playground, a picnic area and a hiking trail.

title: (28048) Madrid -
description: Pothole dirt parking. Area with tables spread around. Do not make fire. Several routes to enjoy hiking through Mount El Pardo.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
description: Parking in the center of the village 3 minutes from the plaza del ayuntamiento, very quiet for the night.

title: (28923) Alcorcón - 1D Avenida América
description: Parking near a public park

title: (28938) Móstoles - 9001A Calle Andrómeda
description: Quiet place to spend the night, with little traffic and easy access, there are 6 spacious spaces that can fit a 7.5m AC. There are many bars and restaurants nearby and a metro stop and an Aldi supermarket 100 meters away.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Parking in raised ground on a municipal ground. It is a quiet place to spend the night, even if it is in the village. It is very close to El Boalo access to La Pedriza. In a large park where there are sports fields, a fountain, etc. Area with very nice views and lots of shade. Wooded and sheltered. At City Hall, they told us it was ok if they are not long stays. The first week of July, apparently, there is a feria. Maybe there are more difficulties. We had two nights without problems, there was only one other van. Great for walking in the Sierra.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid
description: Parking 20 minutes walk from the reservoir

address.street: 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 10 Calle Alfredo Nobel
description: Parking area online, just in front of the police station. Large site, there is no type of services. Usually they have been parked by the neighbors of the area.

title: (28040) Madrid - 7 Avenida Padre Huidobro
description: Parking by the pool, very nice. Motorway next to the car park.
